item.title: How to make your own adjustable keyboard wrist rest pad
item.author: contact@khal.web.id (Khalid Adisendjaja)
item.description: Hi, this is actually my depression in finding a wrist pad that I can adjust accordingly to the height of the keyboard. I’ve been googling around, going back and forth on any e-commerce sites but still couldn’t find anything to my preferences. So I came up with an idea to make my own, I’m starting to research for any wrist pad product out there. I’m focusing on the size of the wrist pad, the height, the length, and the thickness.
